actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay judgments in favor of the Sac and Fox Indians.

summary.text: Provides for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay judgments by the Indian Claims Commission in docket numbered 153 in favor of the Sac and Fox Indians in the States of Iowa, Kansas, Nebraska, and Oklahoma.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay judgments in favor of the Sac and Fox Indians.
